mireka.filter.local.table
Class AliasMapper

Object
  mireka.filter.local.table.AliasMapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
RecipientDestinationMapper
public class AliasMapper
extends Object
implements RecipientDestinationMapper

AliasMapper is a convenience class used in configuration files to create an alias. It maps a mail address to an AliasDestination.
